meta.title: Mario's Adventures | The Super Mario Bros. Movie Game
meta.description: Dive into the world of The Super Mario Bros. Movie Game, explore the Mushroom Kingdom, and embark on epic adventures.

hero.title: Welcome to Mario's Adventure
hero.description: Explore endless possibilities, rescue Princess Peach, and embark on epic adventures in the world of The Super Mario Bros. Movie Game.

items.title: Start Your Journey
items.description: Begin with a vision and plan out your adventure. Strategize and map your path to victory.

items.title: Collect Power-Ups
items.description: Gather coins, stars, and other power-ups to aid you on your quest. Use them wisely to overcome obstacles.

items.title: Overcome Obstacles
items.description: Battle Koopas, Goombas, and other foes. Jump, run, and use your skills to conquer each level.

items.title: Rescue the Princess
items.description: Push forward to save Princess Peach from the clutches of the cunning Bowser and restore peace to the Mushroom Kingdom.

blockscape.title: Mario's World
blockscape.content:
Infinite Possibilities

Hundreds of unique levels and challenges await you. Explore the Mushroom Kingdom, underground caves, and snowy peaks.

Express Yourself

Every jump and action is a reflection of your skill. Create your own path and tell your story in the Mario universe.

craftingGrounds.title: Power-Up Zone
craftingGrounds.content:
Master the Art of Power-Ups

Combine resources to create tools, weapons, armor, and decorative items. Discover new recipes and perfect your crafting skills.

From Fire Flowers to Invincibility Stars, power-ups are at the heart of your Mario journey.

biomeExplorer.title: World Explorer
biomeExplorer.content:
Sunny Meadows

Explore vibrant fields teeming with life and secrets.

Dangerous Deserts

Navigate the sandy dunes and discover hidden treasures.

Snowy Mountains

Brave the cold and build ice palaces in these frozen landscapes.

Deep Oceans

Dive into underwater adventures and find sunken treasures.

items.text: The Super Mario Bros. Movie Game has unleashed my thirst for adventure! I've cleared all levels and made friends from all over the world!
items.name: MushroomHero2000

items.text: The community is what makes this game special. Everyone is so helpful and supportive of each other's progress and adventures.
items.name: PrincessGamer

items.text: I've been playing for over 8 years and still discover new things every day. The possibilities are truly endless!
items.name: StarSeeker
